events.message: The applicant has submitted their mortgage loan application for a new property purchase. All initial details about the property and loan amount have been provided.
The application was reviewed by the intake team and categorised under Mortgage Loan to proceed with the relevant workflow steps.
A dedicated loan officer has been assigned to handle this mortgage application ensuring personalized follow-up and processing.
The loan officer conducted an initial review of the application and identified additional supporting documents required for verification.
Requested essential documents from the applicant including property appraisal, proof of income, and identification to move forward with assessment.
The applicant submitted all requested documents promptly, which included the home appraisal report and bank statements for income verification.
The applicant’s credit report was successfully obtained and showed a strong credit history with no significant negative marks.
Risk analysis was carried out taking into account the loan-to-value ratio and applicant’s financial stability, with results pending manager approval.
A competitive mortgage loan offer was presented to the applicant outlining the interest rates, repayment terms, and conditions for acceptance.
The applicant reviewed the loan offer and provided feedback requesting clarification on certain fees and potential repayment flexibility.
Due to applicant’s queries and specific conditions, the application was escalated to senior management for further evaluation and decision-making.
After thorough consideration, the mortgage loan application was approved with terms agreeable to both parties and compliance criteria met.
The approved mortgage funds have been disbursed to the applicant’s designated account for property purchase settlement.
Follow-up communication was made with the applicant to ensure satisfaction with the loan process and address any new questions or concerns.
The mortgage loan application case has been successfully closed following the disbursement and post-approval follow-up completion.
